lines: 1. There is a balm in Gilead to make the wounded whole; There is a balm in Gilead to heal the sin-sick soul. Sometimes I feel discouraged, And think my work's in vain, But then the Holy Spirit Revives my soul again.

2. There is a balm in Gilead to make the wounded whole; There is a balm in Gilead to heal the sin-sick soul. If you cannot preach like Peter, If you cannot pray like Paul, You can tell the love of Jesus, And say He died for all.
